query.name: com.lex1accnt.students
query.sql: select s.dcid, s.id, s.schoolid, s.grade_level, s.student_number, s.lastfirst, s.last_name, s.first_name, s.gender, s.ethnicity, s.dob, to_char(entrydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as entrydate, to_char(exitdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as exitdate, s.next_school, s.enroll_status, s.exitcode, s.lunchstatus, s.state_studentnumber, s.street, s.city, s.state, s.zip, sx.altassesscde, sx.diploma_type, sx.diplomaearncode, sx.dropout_date, sx.dropout_reason, sx.engl_prof, sx.graddate, sx.gt_qualified, sx.homelang, sx.instrsetting, sx.mckinney_vento_serv, sx.migrant, sx.moved_to_district, sx.moved_to_School, sx.ninthgradecode, sx.usschentrydate, sx.yrgedearned, sx.adulted_entrydate, s.home_room, s.middle_name, s.track from students s left outer join s_Sc_stu_x sx on sx.studentsdcid = s.dcid where (to_char(exitdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(entrydate,'YYYY-MM-DD') or grade_level = 99)

query.sql: select STUDENTSDCID , ALTASSESSCDE , ALTASSESSEXCEPTION , ALTASSESSTA_FIRSTNAME , ALTASSESSTA_LASTNAME , DEAFBLINDIND , ELASORTID , ELDAONLINE_LISTENING , ELDAONLINE_READING , ELDAONLINE_SPEAKING , ELDAONLINE_WRITING , EOCEPONLINEALG , EOCEPONLINEBIO , EOCEPONLINEENG , EOCEPONLINEUSHC , GRADEXPRESS , HSAPMATERIALSCDE , HSAPONLINE_ELA , HSAPONLINE_MATH , KNDRGRTNPREVPGM , READINESS_SCORE2_5K , to_char(READINESS_TESTDATE1_4K,'YYYY-MM-DD') READINESS_TESTDATE1_4K , to_char(READINESS_TESTDATE1_5K,'YYYY-MM-DD') READINESS_TESTDATE1_5K , to_char(READINESS_TESTDATE2_4K,'YYYY-MM-DD') READINESS_TESTDATE2_4K , to_char(READINESS_TESTDATE2_5K,'YYYY-MM-DD') READINESS_TESTDATE2_5K , REQEXCLUSION , SCIENCESORTID , SOCSTUDIESSORTID , STUDENTNOTTESTED_LEP , STUDENTNOTTESTED_REASON_LEP , STUNOTTESTED , STUNOTTESTEDREASON , TESTMISSED , WRITINGSORTID , to_char(WHENMODIFIED,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHENMODIFIED , CRDC_UNGRADED_YN , ORAL_COMMUN_LANG , PRECODE1 , PRECODE2 , TRANS_MODE_PM , WRITTEN_COMMUN_LANG , AWARDEARNCODE , AWARDORDCODE , BUSINFO1 , BUSINFO2 , COMPHEALTHEDCODE , COUNTY , DIPLOMA_TYPE , DIPLOMAEARNCODE , DIPLOMAORDCODE , DIPLOMAORDID , to_char(DROPOUT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') DROPOUT_DATE , DROPOUT_REASON , ENGL_PROF , FIRST_LANG_SPOKEN , FOSTER_HOME , to_char(GRADDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') GRADDATE , GRIDCODE , GT_QUALIFIED , HOMELANG , INSTRSETTING , MCKINNEY_VENTO_SERV , MEDICAIDID , MIGRANT , MOGEDEARNED , MOVED_TO_DISTRICT , MOVED_TO_SCHOOL , NICKNAME , NIGHT_RESIDENCE , NINTHGRADECODE , NOSHOW_REASON , OTHERNAME , PARENTSMILITARYSTATUS , PECOMPCODE , PLAN504CODE , RETAINREASONCODE , SCHOLARSHIPORDCODE , SCHOOLRES , STUDENT_BIRTHCNTRY , STUDENT_BIRTHPLACE , STUDENTGENERATION , TITLE1ASSTTYPECODE , TITLE1MATHIND , TITLE1READIND , TRANS_MODE_AM , TRUEGRADE , UNACCOMP_YOUTH , to_char(USSCHENTRYDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') USSCHENTRYDATE , YRGEDEARNED , SELFCONTAINED , INCLUDEINREPORTING , TRANS_AM_COMMENT , TRANS_PM_COMMENT , to_char(ADULTED_ENTRYDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ADULTED_ENTRYDATE , to_char(ADULTED_EXITDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ADULTED_EXITDATE , AP_PARTICIPANT_NBR , IB_CANDIDATE_NBR , OTHER_ALTASSESSTEST_SCHOOLID , PRECODE3 , PRECODE4 , to_char(ADULTED_GRADDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') , ELASESSIONSORALADMIN , ELIG504_NOPLANIND , EOCEPPAPERELA , EOCEPPAPERMATH , EOCEPPAPERSCIENCE , EOCEPPAPERSOCSTU , G38PAPERELA , G38PAPERMATH , G38PAPERSCIENCE , G38PAPERSOCSTU , to_char(MEDICAIDELIGIBLE_DAT,'YYYY-MM-DD') , NEEDSBRAILLEIND , PRECODE5 , PRECODE6 , PRECODE7 , PRECODE8 , AED_COMPLETION_DATE , AED_OPTOUT_DATE , CPR_COMPLETION_DATE , CPR_OPTOUT_DATE , CEIS_IND , INIT_TESTDATE , INIT_TESTSCORE , INIT_TESTTYPE , PIP_STATUS , to_char(SEI_CREATE_DAT,'YYYY-MM-DD') , SEI_STATUS , WAIVER_IND , CR_ACCOMMODATIONS , CR_grade12 , CR_PaPER , UNIVERSAL_SCREENER , cr_oral_accommodation , elp_paper , TIER , diploma_seals , specialization_area from s_sc_stu_x

query.name: com.lex1accnt.school.teachers
query.sql: SELECT distinct t.STATUS, t.STAFFSTATUS, t.DCID, t.ID, t.SCHOOLID, t.EMAIL_ADDR , t.SCHOOL_PHONE, t.HOME_PHONE, t.STATE, t.ZIP, t.LAST_NAME , t.FIRST_NAME, t.STREET, t.CITY, t.ETHNICITY, t.SCHED_GENDER , t.TEACHERNUMBER, t.TITLE, u.gender, t.lastfirst, t.sif_stateprid, sx.tchr_id FROM Teachers t left outer join users on users.staffpers_guid = t.staffpers_guid left outer join U_SCHOOLSTAFFUSERFIELDS u on u.schoolstaffdcid = t.dcid left outer join s_sc_usr_x sx on sx.usersdcid = users.dcid

query.name: com.lex1accnt.school.sections
query.sql: SELECT s.DCID ,s.ID ,s.SCHOOLID ,s.COURSE_NUMBER ,s.GRADE_LEVEL ,s.SECTION_NUMBER ,s.TEACHER ,s.TERMID,s.room,s.expression,s.gradescaleid,s.excludefromstoredgrades, s.wheretaught,u.immersion,s.EXCLUDE_ADA FROM Sections s left outer join u_Sc3201_sectionextras u on u.sectionsdcid = s.dcid where s.termid >= (select distinct currentyearid from u_Sc3201_Schools) * 100

query.name: com.lex1accnt.school.cc
query.description: Queries for student to section roster mapping
query.sql: SELECT cc.DCID ,cc.ID ,cc.STUDENTID ,cc.SECTIONID ,cc.COURSE_NUMBER ,cc.SECTION_NUMBER ,cc.DATEENROLLED ,cc.DATELEFT,cc.termid FROM CC where cc.termid >= (select distinct currentyearid from u_Sc3201_schools) * 100
